review: To start with, I work in IT and have experience setting up wireless networks. At home, my other (competitor's) streaming "stick" works fine. I say that because I have had nothing but issues trying to get this device to talk to my Google Nexus 5 (Android) phone. It works fine with it's bluetooth remote, but the UI is significantly more difficult to navigate using the remote than the phone. Since the connection doesn't work, none of the tie-ins work, so I can't give this device more than 2 starts. If they fix the app
